column1: I had a great meeting yesterday at work with my boss and a few colleagues and we went out for lunch afterward
column2: everybody was excited by the projects we're working on and how efficient our team is.

column1: This maid of mine who comes to wash dishes at home is usually late. This morning I was in a hurry to go to the bank for some important work. Well what do you know! The maid came right on time. The dishes were cleaned. I did not want to come home to a mess.
